plant.question: I am green and grow in the ground. Animals like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am small and leafy.
🐇 Rabbits love to munch on me.
🥗 You can find me in a salad.

plant.question: I have a trunk and leaves, and birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am tall and strong.
🐿️ Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍃 I give shade on a sunny day.

plant.question: I am a flower that is usually red, and people give me to show they care. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I have petals and a stem.
❤️ I am often given as a gift on Valentine's Day.
💐 You can find me in a bouquet.

plant.question: I am long, green, and crunchy. You can eat me raw or cooked. What am I?

hints.text: 🥒 I grow on a vine.
🥪 I am often put in salads or sandwiches.
🥗 Pickles are made from me.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and juicy inside. Monkeys like to eat me a lot. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow on a tall tree in warm places.
🪨 My shell is very tough to crack.
🥥 My inside is white and can be made into milk.

plant.question: I am a plant with sharp needles instead of leaves. You decorate me for Christmas. What am I?

hints.text: 🌲 I stay green all year long.
🎁 People put presents under me.
🌟 We put a star on the top of me sometimes.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that grows underground and is orange. Rabbits love to eat me.

hints.text: 🥕 I am a root vegetable.
👁️ Eating me is good for your eyesight.
🚜 Farmers plant me in rows.

plant.question: I am a grain that grows tall and yellow. You can make popcorn from me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow on a cob.
🍿 You can eat me at the movies.
🐔 Chickens like to eat me.

plant.question: I have a sticky, sweet center and am often found in honey. What kind of flower am I?

hints.text: 🐝 Bees love me.
🍯 My nectar is used to make honey.
🌸 I am often yellow or white and grow in fields.

plant.question: I am a seed that comes in a pod, and I'm good for you! I can be green, yellow, or even black. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am a legume.
🥣 You can eat me in soup or by myself.
💪 I am full of protein to make you strong!

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and fish swim through. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slow, what am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐢 I am a reptile.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze through small spaces.
⚫ I can change color.
💦 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and pinch with my claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I walk sideways.
🏖️ I live on the beach and in the water.
⚫ I have eyes on stalks.

ocean.question: I am very big and like to spout water high in the air. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am a mammal, not a fish.
🌊 I live in the ocean and eat krill.
🎶 I can sing songs.

ocean.question: I’m flat and have five arms but I'm not a person. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I look like a star.
🖐️ I can grow back my arms.
🌊 I live on the ocean floor.

ocean.question: I have a pointy nose and like to jump out of the water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am very smart.
😊 I am always smiling.
🗣️ I communicate with clicks and whistles.

ocean.question: I have many teeth and swim very fast. People are scared of me! What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a type of fish.
🌊 I am a predator.
💪 I am at the top of the food chain.

ocean.question: I'm a tiny creature that makes a giant reef. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I am an animal.
🏠 I live in colonies.
🧱 I build homes made of calcium carbonate.

ocean.question: I drift in the ocean and sting with my tentacles. What am I?

hints.text: 🎈 I am bell-shaped.
🌊 I don't have bones.
⚡ My sting can be painful.
